entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 6:24PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Dense fog possible this evening... If traveling this evening be prepared for fog that could suddenly reduce visibilities to 1/4 mile or less. Expect the fog to improve from south to north after 9pm as the winds pick up. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

entry.summary: ...HEAVY DOWNPOURS AND LOCALIZED FLOODING POSSIBLE THIS EVENING... A low pressure system and associated frontal boundaries will pass through northeast Wisconsin this evening.
